title: Dragon slaying
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                                          |
| - | -------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | It inflicts extra damage against dragons and draconians. |

The **dragon slaying** [brand](/Brand "Brand"), exclusive to [Wyrmbane](/Wyrmbane "Wyrmbane"), does the following:

- Deals a flat +75% damage against any kind of [dragon](/List_of_dragons "List of dragons"), drake, or [draconian](/List_of_draconians "List of draconians"). This includes player [draconians](/Draconian "Draconian") and those in [Dragon Form](/Dragon_Form "Dragon Form").

Note that some dragon-like monsters are not vulnerable to dragon slaying, namely [wyverns](/Wyvern "Wyvern") and [hydras](/Hydra "Hydra"). Neither are [komodo dragons](/Komodo_dragon "Komodo dragon"), as those are a type of real-world [reptile](/List_of_reptiles_and_amphibians "List of reptiles and amphibians").

## Sources

Dragon slaying can only be found on [Wyrmbane](/Wyrmbane "Wyrmbane"). It cannot be obtained in any other way.

## History

- Prior to [0.15](/0.15 "0.15"), the brand could generate on any [polearm](/Polearm "Polearm").
- Prior to [0.13](/0.13 "0.13"), this brand also reduced a susceptible enemy's chance to hit you with their breath weapons by 25%, flavoured as the dragons being averse to looking at the weapon (and therefore having difficulty lining up a shot).
- In [0.12](/0.12 "0.12") and [0.13](/0.13 "0.13"), drakes were unaffected by the dragon slaying brand.

| [Brands](/Brand "Brand") |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| ------------------------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Melee weapons            | [Antimagic](/Antimagic "Antimagic") • [Chaos](/Chaos "Chaos") • [Distortion](/Distortion "Distortion") • [Draining](/Draining_\(brand\) "Draining (brand)") • [Electrocution](/Electrocution "Electrocution") • [Flaming](/Flaming "Flaming") • [Freezing](/Freezing "Freezing") • [Heavy](/Heavy "Heavy") • [Holy wrath](/Holy_wrath "Holy wrath") • [Pain](/Pain_\(brand\) "Pain (brand)") • [Protection](/Protection "Protection") • [Reaching](/Reaching "Reaching") • [Spectral](/Spectral_\(brand\) "Spectral (brand)") • [Speed](/Speed_\(brand\) "Speed (brand)") • [Vampiric](/Vampiric "Vampiric") • [Venom](/Venom "Venom") [Disruption](/Disruption "Disruption") • [Dragon slaying]() • [Reaping](/Reaping "Reaping") • [Silver](/Silver "Silver") |
| Launchers                | [Antimagic](/Antimagic "Antimagic") • [Draining](/Draining_\(brand\) "Draining (brand)") • [Electrocution](/Electrocution "Electrocution") • [Flaming](/Flaming "Flaming") • [Freezing](/Freezing "Freezing") • [Heavy](/Heavy "Heavy") • [Penetration](/Penetration "Penetration") • [Speed](/Speed_\(brand\) "Speed (brand)")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| Throwing weapons         | [Atropa](/Atropa "Atropa") • [Curare](/Curare "Curare") • [Datura](/Datura "Datura") • [Dispersal](/Dispersal_\(brand\) "Dispersal (brand)") • [Poisoned](/Poisoned "Poisoned") • [Silver](/Silver "Silver")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
html:
Dragon slaying

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
It inflicts extra damage against dragons and draconians.

The dragon slaying brand, exclusive to Wyrmbane, does the following:

  • Deals a flat +75% damage against any kind of dragon, drake, or draconian. This includes player draconians and those in Dragon Form.

Note that some dragon-like monsters are not vulnerable to dragon slaying, namely wyverns and hydras. Neither are komodo dragons, as those are a type of real-world reptile.

Sources

Dragon slaying can only be found on Wyrmbane. It cannot be obtained in any other way.

History

  • Prior to 0.15, the brand could generate on any polearm.
  • Prior to 0.13, this brand also reduced a susceptible enemy's chance to hit you with their breath weapons by 25%, flavoured as the dragons being averse to looking at the weapon (and therefore having difficulty lining up a shot).
  • In 0.12 and 0.13, drakes were unaffected by the dragon slaying brand.
Brands
Melee weapons Antimagic • Chaos • Distortion • Draining • Electrocution • Flaming • Freezing • Heavy • Holy wrath • Pain • Protection • Reaching • Spectral • Speed • Vampiric • Venom
Disruption • Dragon slaying • Reaping • Silver
Launchers Antimagic • Draining • Electrocution • Flaming • Freezing • Heavy • Penetration • Speed
Throwing weapons Atropa • Curare • Datura • Dispersal • Poisoned • Silver

{{version030}}
{{flavour|It inflicts extra damage against dragons and draconians.}}
The '''dragon slaying''' [[brand]], exclusive to [[Wyrmbane]], does the following:
*Deals a flat +75% damage against any kind of [[list of dragons|dragon]], drake, or [[list of draconians|draconian]]. This includes player [[draconian]]s and those in [[Dragon Form]].

Note that some dragon-like monsters are not vulnerable to dragon slaying, namely [[wyvern]]s and [[hydra]]s. Neither are [[komodo dragon]]s, as those are a type of real-world [[list of reptiles and amphibians|reptile]].

==Sources==
Dragon slaying can only be found on [[Wyrmbane]]. It cannot be obtained in any other way.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.15]], the brand could generate on any [[polearm]].
*Prior to [[0.13]], this brand also reduced a susceptible enemy's chance to hit you with their breath weapons by 25%, flavoured as the dragons being averse to looking at the weapon (and therefore having difficulty lining up a shot).
*In [[0.12]] and [[0.13]], drakes were unaffected by the dragon slaying brand.
